Colt M4A1 - an assault rifle (carbine), designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 5.56x45 NATO cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for picatinny/weaver (except of Red Dot Sights with low mount: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight, 1P76 Rakurs (low mount).
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: NATO supressor

Like Beard, a merchant from Zaton, in his time, Skinflint also decided to earn extra money by selling carbines in "his" body kit. The result was a good, light and very ergonomic barrel based on the M4.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for picatinny/weaver (except of Red Dot Sights with low mount: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight, 1P76 Rakurs (low mount) and MarchF).
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: NATO supressor
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] M203 grenade launcher

Modernized model Colt M4A1 Commando (CQBR) is an assault rifle, designed in the USA on the basis of AR-15 platform for 5.56x45 NATO cartridge. It was developed primarily for use by vehicle operators and fireteams, who required a more compact and lighter weapon than a standard full-length rifle, but using the same ordnance. However, US SOCOM (United States Special Operations Command) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for all subordinate units, followed by general introduction of M4A1 into service in the US Army and Marine Corps.

 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for picatinny/weaver (except of Red Dot Sights with low mount: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight, 1P76 Rakurs (low mount) and OKP-7.

A deeply modernized AR15 rifle, usually in service with the veterans of the Freedom. The body kit installed on the weapon allows you to feel confident at any firing range, but at the same time, the weapon is distinguished by a high price due to the use of very expensive components in the kit.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for picatinny/weaver (except of Red Dot Sights with low mount: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight and 1P76 Rakurs (picatinny).
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Installed Upgrades: B.E. MEYERS MAWL-C1 tactical green laser aim module, Hera Arms foregrip (helps in recoil control) and stock.
